metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14404 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/rre.c allows out-of-bounds access via encodings.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14404` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.2
libvncserver1 - 0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

vino - 3.22.0-5ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.2').
veyon package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
vino package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-5ubuntu2.1').
x11vnc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
